title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
creator_credit: Kazuya Tsurumaki, Hideaki Anno, Mitsuhisa Ishikawa, SEGA, Toei Company, Kadokawa Shoten Publishing, Production I.G, TV Tokyo, Star Child Recording, Movic and GAINAX
brief_description: The second of two theatrically released follow-ups to the Neon Genesis Evangelion series about the battle between humanity and terrifying angels.

constellations_other.name: Evangelical animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation exploring animation was created by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Melanie Kavanagh.

title_for_label: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
creator_credit_for_label: Kazuya Tsurumaki, Hideaki Anno, Mitsuhisa Ishikawa, SEGA, Toei Company, Kadokawa Shoten Publishing, Production I.G, TV Tokyo, Star Child Recording, Movic and GAINAX
description: The second of two theatrically released follow-ups to the Neon Genesis Evangelion series. Comprising of two alternate episodes which were first intended to take the place of episodes 25 and 26, this finale answers many of the questions surrounding the series, while also opening up some new possibilities.
description_for_label: The second of two theatrically released follow-ups to the Neon Genesis Evangelion series. Comprising of two alternate episodes which were first intended to take the place of episodes 25 and 26, this finale answers many of the questions surrounding the series, while also opening up some new possibilities.
